mapper.select: SELECT ph.penalty_id, ph.user_id, u.user_name AS user_name, ph.penalty_type AS penaltyType, ph.reason, ph.created_at, CASE ph.status_id WHEN 1 THEN '처리중' WHEN 2 THEN '처리완료' WHEN 3 THEN '거절됨' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS statusId, ph.post_id, ph.comment_id, ph.review_id FROM user_penalty_history ph JOIN user u ON ph.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ph.penalty_id = #{penaltyId}
